original_text: He hath also kindled his wrath against me, and he counteth me unto him as one of his enemies.
korean_text: 나를 향하여 진노하시고 원수 같이 보시는구나

sentences.original_text: He hath also kindled his wrath against me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 나를 향해 그의 분노를 불태우셨다

sentences.original_text: and he counteth me unto him

sentences.korean_translation: 그의 원수 중 한 사람으로 여기신다
